messages.content:
Based on the Dallas Cowboys schedule provided, the main events happening in August are:

1. Preseason Week 1: Sunday, August 11 at 3:30 PM CDT - Cowboys at Los Angeles Rams

2. Preseason Week 2: Saturday, August 17 at 9:00 PM CDT - Cowboys at Las Vegas Raiders

3. Preseason Week 3: Saturday, August 24 at 3:00 PM CDT - Los Angeles Chargers at Cowboys (home game at AT&T Stadium)

These are the three preseason games scheduled for the Dallas Cowboys in August, which serve as warmup matches before the regular season begins in September.
